document_data.name: Varri Vanthampur
document_data.mainbody: '''Varri Vanthampur''' was an unwanted member of the [[Vanthampur]] family of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: Varri Vanthampur perished in the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, shortly before the armies of the [[Cult of the Absolute]] attacked the city of Baldur's Gate. Varri's tombstone was commissioned to be carved by [[Candulhallow's Tombstones]] in the [[Baldur's Gate/Lower City|Lower City]]. The freshly-carved grave marker was stored in Candulhallow's shop's main room, just left of the main entrance. It read: "Varri Vanthampur. Unwanted in life, welcomed in death."
